serverInfo.name: OneDrive-Canvas
serverInfo.title: OneDrive Canvas
serverInfo.description: Canvas lets you create and edit markdown files stored in OneDrive using simple MCP tools. Users can read, insert and replace content line-by-line, or create new documents directly from a chat workflow. Canvas provides lightweight text editing capabilities that remain synchronized across OneDrive folders and devices.

instructions: Canvas markdown files can be stored on any drive as long as the user has write permissions. After you made updates to the canvas, always read the resource result with read_resource tool, so the user sees the latest version.
